product_name: Salewa Alp Trainer Mid Gore-Tex Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: A great choice for trail adventures, the Salewa Alp Trainer Mid Gore-Tex hiking shoes offer the support of hiking boots and the lightness and technical features of approach shoes.
